name: Slime Rave
description:
A Platformer Exploration Game made for Godot Wild Jam 13.
Engine Version:  Godot 3.1
Theme:  Merge

The Purpose of the game is to explore and collect orbs of different colors, merging them with yourself to change your color and grow in size. 

Depending on what Orbs you have collected by the end of the game, it gives you a Result to the question "What kind of Slime am I?" 

The game Currently Includes a Tutorial and a First Level. 

For Windows Download "SlimeRave_Windows.zip"
For Linux Download "SlimeRave_Linux.zip"
For Mac Download "SlimeRave.zip"


Controls: (Requires Keyboard & Mouse)
Left, Right or W, D - Horizontial Movement.
Spacebar - Jump
Escape - Pause Menu 
Q/E - Cycle Through Colors (Red-Green-Blue) 
1- Select Red Color 
2- Select Green Color 
3- Select Blue Color
